article_title: New Medicaid benefits will cover substance abuse
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: Healthcare reform has the potential to dramatically impact substance abuse treatment, according to New Futures Policy Director, Michelle Merritt.The Affordable Care Act (ACA) states that insurance plans must include The Ten Essential Health Benefits, “So anyone buying a plan would have a substance abuse, mental health benefit,” Merritt said.“The benefit would be subject to co-pays and co-insurance, like any other service, but this is huge because there was no requirement
